text:
@realDonaldTrump 1st thing you have not lied about & that is helpful to the nation. 

I guess contracting Covid-19 will do that to you.  No one believes that you don’t have it already.  Also - stop shaking hands, Jackass. 

BTW - Where are the tests for US citizens?  

#TrumpIncompetenceKills. https://t.co/D46Ddih1oI
